version_description:
+ New features;
- Fullscreen and mini player with Equalizer (Supports mp4, mkv, avi, flv, 3gp, mp3 etc.)
- Cloud Uploads
- Swipe left/right for navigating in the main screens

* General Bug fixes

+ New features;
- Fullscreen and mini player with Equalizer (Supports mp4, mkv, avi, flv, 3gp, mp3 etc.)
- Cloud Uploads
- Swipe left/right for navigating in the main screens

* General Bug fixes

* Supports iOS12 and new iPhones
* Player background playback issue fixed
* Player supports Airplay
* Cloud folder browsing and file preview implemented
* New languages added

** Some hot bug fixes

* Supports iOS12 and new iPhones
* Player background playback issue fixed
* Player supports Airplay
* Cloud folder browsing and file preview implemented
* New languages added

** Some hot bug fixes

* Player improvements
Minor improvements
Minor improvements

* Passcode locker bug fixed
* Downloading problems are fixed for Arabic language(RTL) users

* Passcode locker bug fixed
* Downloading problems are fixed for Arabic language(RTL) users
* UI improvements
* UI improvements

* Crashing and freezing problems are fixed
* Cloud Manager, Web Browser and Downloader Manager problems are fixed
* Contact Form added to the Settings screen

* Crashing and freezing problems are fixed
* Cloud Manager, Web Browser and Downloader Manager problems are fixed
* Contact Form added to the Settings screen
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• bug fixes and small improvements
Bug fixes for Premium features
Bug fixes for Premium features

Great new features and enhancements in this update!

- Added video and audio conversion for m3u8, mkv, avi, ts, 3gp, mp4, mp3 files.
- Photo scanner feature added.
- Live Photos are imported as Video now.
- Swipe down to dismiss fullscreen player
- Player background playback improvements.
- Improved Cloud downloads
- Now you can browse on the cloud for uploading files
- Photos(CamRol) picker improvements
- Interface & localisation improvements.
- User experience improvements.

Great new features and enhancements in this update!

- Added video and audio conversion for m3u8, mkv, avi, ts, 3gp, mp4, mp3 files.

- Improved Cloud downloads
- Now you can browse on the cloud for uploading files
- Photos(CamRol) picker improvements
- Interface & localisation improvements.
- User experience improvements.
